short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly integrate messaging, gaming, and streaming into a single, convenient screen with Nest!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Nest Browser: The ultimate Chrome addon designed to elevate your online experience! 

Seamlessly integrate messaging, gaming, and streaming into a single, convenient screen. Say goodbye to tab clutter and hello to a world of endless entertainment. Add Nest Browser to Chrome and let the fun begin!

What inspired the creation of Nest?

We tried many extensions, and all fell short in terms of user-friendly design and flexibility, especially when it came to splitting your screen. Frustrated by the lack of a solution that offered both flexibility and ease of use, we embarked on a mission to create a better, more versatile tool.

What possibilities does Nest unlock for you?

If you can open a page or web application in your browser (which is true for most cases), you can do the same inside the Nest Chrome extension. This allows you to view up to three web pages or applications simultaneously on a single screen, eliminating the need to constantly switch between tabs.

Which sites and web applications does Nest seamlessly support?
• Messenger
• Facebook
• YouTube
• TradeMe
• And many more...

Nest is compatible with numerous other sites and web applications, providing you with a versatile and efficient browsing experience.
 
What are the benefits of Nest?

•	Convenience: No need to juggle between different tabs or applications. Nest Browser consolidates messaging, gaming, and streaming into a single, user-friendly interface.
•	Efficiency: Boost your productivity by having everything you need in one place. Access your messages, games, and streaming content without the hassle of constantly switching between tabs.
•	User-Friendly: Nest Browser is designed with simplicity in mind. It's easy to install, navigate, and customise according to your preferences.

Who is behind Nest?

We at Nest (Father & Son team) embarked on the creation of Nest Browser as a Chrome extension driven by a passion to revolutionise the online experience. 

Wanting to provide users with a seamless and enjoyable online environment, the duo chose the Chrome extension platform to ensure widespread accessibility and compatibility.

Practical Uses

Trade Me, eBay or Auctions: Stay updated on auctions by keeping the platform open on the side of the page you're browsing, ensuring you never miss the end of an auction.

Gaming and Messaging: Play online games while engaging in conversations on Messenger by having the chat window open on the side of your gaming page.

Multitasking with Entertainment: Stream your favourite content from the sidebar while working in your main browser window. Enjoy your favourite streaming service alongside your main tasks, all on the same page.

Share/Stock Monitoring: Monitor stock prices while browsing in your main window, ensuring you stay informed about market changes and never miss a trading opportunity.

You Decide Flexibility: Customise your Nest experience effortlessly by adding or removing pages as you see fit. Chat, browse, play games, and stay active on social media simultaneously, all on the same screen and page. 

With Nest, you have complete control over your online activities, allowing you to seamlessly manage what you want and where you want it.
